title: Pixel 4 - Pixel Launcher Keeps Stopping after Update
content:
I updated my Pixel 4 to the latest security version this morning and now every time I go to the Home screen it says `Pixel Launcher Keeps Stopping'. I have tried restarting etc but no luck.

Most issues seem to be about the Pixel 2 or 3 but mine is a 4!

I tried clearing the cache etc but it is still not working!

I installed a 3rd party launcher and made it the default but it seems to defeat the purpose to not use the original launcher!

Has anyone else had this issue?

Is so is there a fix?
